events.title: Taylor Swift The Eras Tour
events.description: Join Taylor Swift on her highly anticipated sixth worldwide tour, The Eras Tour! The tour will celebrate all nine of her studio albums, from her self-titled debut to Folklore and Evermore. Swift will perform a medley of hits from each era, as well as never-before-heard songs and fan favorites. The tour will also feature special guests, such as HAIM and Bebe Rexha.

events.title: The Weeknd After Hours Til Dawn Tour
events.description: Prepare to be transported to a mesmerizing spectacle as The Weeknd embarks on his highly anticipated After Hours Til Dawn Tour. This global odyssey will showcase his captivating blend of soulful R&B, electrifying synth-pop, and dark undertones, all while immersing fans in his cinematic world. Expect a theatrical production that will ignite the senses and leave you breathless as The Weeknd performs anthems from his critically acclaimed albums After Hours and Dawn FM, as well as fan favorites from his extensive discography.

events.title: NewJeans - Get Up Tour
events.description: Get ready to get up and dance with NewJeans! The rising K-pop girl group is bringing their energetic and infectious music to your city. Fans can expect to hear all of their favorite hits, including Hype Boy, Cookie, OMG, and ASAP.
